CustomField.description: If checked, the Other Address fields on Contact are required when a contact is added as a Beneficial Owner. If not checked, it will pull in the Other Address if filled in, otherwise it will pull in the Mailing Address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Other Address fields on Contact are required when a contact is added as a Beneficial Owner. If not checked, it will pull in the Other Address if filled in, otherwise it will pull in the Mailing Address.
CustomField.label: Beneficial Owner Home Address Required
